clinical_study.brief_title: A Prospective Study to Compare Bupivacaine and Exparel Versus Bupivacaine or Exparel Alone for Postoperative Pain Relief
clinical_study.official_title: Combined Administration of Bupivacaine and Exparel Versus Bupivacaine or Exparel Alone for Postoperative Analgesia in Posterior Lumbar Spine Surgery - A Prospective Randomized Study

brief_summary.textblock: The purpose of this study is to collect information about how patients feel when doctors manage their pain after lumbar spine surgery using a combination of EXPAREL® and bupivacaine injected into the lumbar spine at the end of surgery, compared to the patients that doctors use only EXPAREL® or bupivacaine to manage their pain. This information will help doctors determine which approach works best for patients who will receive surgery in their lumbar spine in the future.
